scripts.cy:registerPageFirefoxHeadless: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/tests/RegisterPageTest.js" --browser firefox --headless --record --key d42d4ae7-992a-41fb-87d6-055bf25d6f5f --reporter mochawesome
scripts.cy:registerPageChromeHeaded: npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/tests/RegisterPageTest.js" --browser chrome --headed --record --key d42d4ae7-992a-41fb-87d6-055bf25d6f5f --reporter mochawesome
scripts.cy:sorry-cypress:parallel: CYPRESS_API_URL=http://localhost:1234/ npx cy2 run --spec cypress/integration/tests/LoginPageTest.js --browser firefox --parallel --record --key d42d4ae7-992a-41fb-87d6-055bf25d6f5f --ci-build-id cypress-parallel
